name: sands - sands are temporary (HOW DARE YOU?)
description:
sands are temporary. the same goes for their absence, too.

-this is the third of a three piece-animation collection created by manipulating a picture of sands which are one of the unseen elements of a temporary world. after this collection, the next theme is clouds. 
keep your eyeZ open to see what we'll be showing.

all is temporary.

animation by: eyzget
